com.infinum.selection.service

Class CityService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.infinum.selection.service.CityService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICityService

    @Service
public class CityService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICityService
    Class contains implementation of ICityService interface.
    Service class containing logic for manipulating with cities data into the system. It allows adding new cities to the system by authorized users, adding and removing cities to users favorite list and fetching cities sorted in various ways.
